<template>
     {{realTitle }}
  <button @click="typeWriter">Basssss</button>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: "App",
  data() {
    return {
      title: "selam test",
      realTitle: "",
      speed: "30",
      replace: [
        {from: "Vue", to: "React?"},
        {from: "Typewriter React?", to: "Joking, it`s Vue!"},
      ],
    }
  },
  methods:{
    typeWriter(){
     let i = 0;
      if ( i < this.title.length) {
         this.realTitle.charAt(i);
         console.log(this.title.length)
        i= i+1;

      }
      setTimeout(this.typeWriter, this.speed)
    },
  }
}
</script>
